nodes.bodyText: This is ugly... Is there a better way?
What is ugly?  The code duplication? There may be a better way, but let's worry about that when we have a third test case.
Should these two lines use issue3447?
I would name the file and class Issue3447.

nodes.bodyText: Does the test even produce an Out.txt file?
It does. This test relies on dataflow/src/test/java/livevar/LiveVariable.java.
You're just not comparing against a golden file, but the test suite still generates the Out.txt file. Sounds good.
